alert.note: Alert for Early (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 10:37PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Dale, southern Henry, northern Houston and northwestern Early Counties through 1100 PM EDT/1000 PM CDT/... At 1036 PM EDT/936 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Abbeville to near Headland to Level Plains. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Abbeville, Headland, Dothan, Blakely, Enterprise, Fort Novosel, Ozark, Taylor, Midland City, Kinsey, Ashford, Level Plains, Cowarts, Newton, Webb, Columbia, Pinckard, Rehobeth and Clayhatchee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
